Kana: どうもありがとうございます

Meaning: Suffix that attaches to country names to mean a person from that country

Kana: ありがとうございます

Meaning: Conjecture form of です. Similar to “it will probably be” or “it might be.”

column5: room that has the bath in it

Meaning: See you when you get home!
A suffix that can attach to any noun to mean a store that sells that thing
A suffix that can attach to any noun to mean a person who works at a store that sells that thing
A suffix that attaches to a number to mean a student of that year
A suffix that attaches to a type of learning institution to mean a student who attends there
A suffix that attaches to the name of a country to mean the language spoken there
A conjunction used to create lists of items
column4: with the implication that there are other similar things included but not named

Meaning: A suffix that attaches to the end of a name as a diminuitive version of san
How many long or cylindrical objects?
Suffix for counting the hours of the day
Suffix that indicates a bill of the given denomination
Suffix for a coin of such-and-such value
Suffix that attaches to a number to indicate a number of times

column4: or location marker for active verbs
